pageDescription: Upload your product image to instantly create compelling descriptions for your target market.
dragAndDrop:
Drag & drop an image here, or
click to select a file
customPromptDescription: Provide specific instructions to customize the generated product description.
customPromptPlaceholder: Example: Focus on the eco-friendly materials and mention that it's handmade.
targetMarketDescription: Choose the target audience for your product description.
resultsDescription: Your generated product description and analysis will appear here.
invalidFileError: Please select a valid image file.
copiedDescription: has been copied to the clipboard.
copyFailedDescription: Could not copy text to clipboard.
